metadata.Title: CVE-2018-20185 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: In GraphicsMagick 1.4 snapshot-20181209 Q8 on 32-bit platforms, there is aheap-based buffer over-read in the ReadBMPImage function of bmp.c, whichallows attackers to cause a denial of service via a crafted bmp image file.This only affects GraphicsMagick installations with customized BMP limits.

criterions.comment: graphicsmagick: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
